Brushfire.desc: Add 5 Fire tiles into random columns in the board.

Mudslide.desc: Add 5 Earth tiles into random columns in the board.

Cyclone.desc: Add 5 Air tiles into random columns in the board.

Stampede.desc: Add 5 Muscle tiles into random columns in the board.

Molotov.desc: Deal 40 damage to your opponent. Inflict Burning on all tiles in a small area. Discard 1 random hex.

Leeches.title: Leeches!
Leeches.desc: Gain a buff that heals you for 30% of all damage you deal. Lasts 1 turn.

Bolster.desc: Gain a stacking buff that increases the damage you deal and reduces the damage you take by 20%. Lasts 2 turns

LegWeights.title: Leg Weights
LegWeights.desc: Duplicate: Persist: Your opponent loses 1 AP next turn.

RollingBone.title: Rolling Bone
RollingBone.desc: Discard your hand and draw that many hexes.

Stardust.desc: Add one fire, water, earth, air, and muscle basic tile to the board in random columns.

Sanctuary.desc: Gain a buff that makes you invulnerable to damage. Lasts 2 turns.

EvilDoll.title: Evil Doll
EvilDoll.desc: Persist: Deal damage to the opponent equal to the amount of health you healed this turn.

Lifestealer.desc: Persist: Deal 20 damage. Heal 20 health. Gain a stacking buff that increases the damage you deal and reduces the damage you take by 10%. The buff lasts 5 turns.

LivingMana.title: Living Mana
LivingMana.desc: Duplicate: Persist: Gain 15 health and shuffle a muscle and water tile into your deck.

FutureSight.title: Future Sight
FutureSight.desc: Look at the top 3 hexes of your deck. Draw one and discard the other 2.

Soulbind.desc: Place a debuff on both players that discards 1 hex at the end of each turn. Your opponent takes 7 damage when either player discards over the duration. Lasts 3 turns.
